income_messages:
From: b***************n@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-14 22:24:39
SUBJECT: I am. Mr BRAIN L.Flynn. I got 
I am. Mr BRAIN L.Flynn. I got your email address from a mail directory, so I decided to give permission to inherit my funds ($2.5 Million USD)Two Million Five Hundred Thousand U.S. Dollars) which is with the (Addison First credit Bank) it's sad and painful that I am living on this earth without a wife or children.
I am originally from Norway. My father passed away when I was 21 while my mother passed away in 2009, I have uncles but we are not in a good relationship, I don't know the reason but it all started from my father and I couldn't question him at that moment.
Presently I am 77 years old and I work with American Airlines. It was so shocking and sad that I contacted this deadly virus (COVID-19) which has taken so many lives out of this world.
I am presently in a hospital where I have been undergoing treatment. I have since lost my ability to talk and the doctor has told me that I have only a few weeks to live on this earth. so, I think the best thing to do is to use someone who is trustworthy that will inherit my funds, the reason why I decided to give out my funds is to avoid being taken by the government. I want you to utilize 60% of my fund's orphanages and widows around the world.
Please as soon as you receive this email reply back to me, I will give the details of my bank and also issue you a permission letter that will prove you as the new recipient of my funds.
Please assure me that you will use it as I mentioned and keep these contacts confidential.
Regards
Mr. BRAIN L.Flynn
From: b***************n@gmail.com
To: tl30398@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-15 00:15:09
SUBJECT: Re: I am. Mr BRAIN L.Flynn. I got
I Wish to say may God bless you for me. Due to my health issue, I was
unable to write down a letter of authority that will prove you as the new
beneficiary of my funds. My doctor said I need to have some rest for a
couple of hours before I can do anything with you because it is very risky
for my health. I wish to ask you to please keep praying for me for my
health condition but I assured you that in a due time I will forward you
the letter of authority with a bank email. I need your name and address to
make a letter of authority.
God bless you.

I will send you the latter of authority with my passport. Please be patient
with me. I need to get some sleep.
Thanks for your prayers. God bless you.

outbound_messages:
From: tl30398@l******s.email
To: b***************n@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-14 22:24:44
SUBJECT: Re: I am. Mr BRAIN L.Flynn. I got 
Dear Mr. BRAIN,
Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I am sorry to hear about your health condition and the loss of your family members. It is kind of you to consider donating your funds to orphanages and widows around the world.
I am interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide me with more details about the inheritance process and the bank where the funds are located? Also, I would like to know more about the permission letter that you mentioned.
Rest assured that I will use the funds as you have instructed and keep our contacts confidential. Thank you for considering me for this opportunity.
Best wishes,
Jessica
From: tl30398@l******s.email
To: b***************n@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-15 01:24:28
SUBJECT: Re: I am. Mr BRAIN L.Flynn. I got
Thank you for your kind words and concern for my well-being. I hope you are taking good care of yourself and getting the rest you need. I understand your situation and will keep you in my thoughts and prayers. However, I cannot provide you with my personal information at this time. Once you are feeling better and able to send the letter of authority, we can proceed with the necessary steps. Take care.
Best wishes,
Jessica

SUBJECT: Re: I am. Mr BRAIN L.Flynn. I got

Best wishes,
Jessica

Time: 2023-04-15 10:12:27
SUBJECT: Re: I am. Mr BRAIN L.Flynn. I got
Thank you for explaining the process to me. I appreciate your efforts in sending me the letter of authority and your passport. I will wait patiently for it. Have a good rest and take care. God bless you too.
Best wishes,
Jessica
From: tl30398@l******s.email
